## R Markdown

This is my first R Markdown file for DSC 520 
```{r}
print("hello")
# some math stuff
5
5+5
# variables, good stuff
name <- "jake"
age <- 29
name
age
class(age)
max(4,5,6,8)
nchar("test")
paste("test", "string")
10 > 9
x <- 1:10
x
class(x)
a <- 33
b <- 34
# curly bracket scope like c
if (b>a) {
  print("b is greater")
}
# data structures
fruits <- c("watermelon","pineapple")
veggies <- c("potato","turnip")
fruitveg <- c(fruits,veggies)
fruitveg
# graphics
plot(1,3)
datacars <- mtcars
datacars
dim(datacars)
names(datacars)
summary(datacars)
```
